messages.zh: 第十四关（前）
messages.en: level 14(pre)

messages.zh: 进来吧。
messages.en: Come in.

messages.zh: ......凯尔希医生！
messages.en: ……Dr.Ka’ltsit!
——Amiya……

messages.zh: 是你。
messages.en: It’s you.

messages.zh: 咳咳。
messages.en: cough cough.

messages.zh: 魏长官，罗德岛的两位代表到了。
messages.en: Executive Wei, the two representatives of Rhodes Island are here.

messages.zh: 哦——另两位客人也来了啊。
messages.en: Oh——The other two guests have arrived.

messages.zh: 请坐。凯尔希小姐正向我说明现在的局势呢。
messages.en: Please have a sit. Ms. Kal’tsit is explaining the situation for me.

messages.zh: ——局势怎么样，魏先生很清楚。
messages.en: ——You know very well, what the situation is like.

messages.zh: 十二天来，各方政治领袖都被同一个消息所震惊——
messages.en: During the past twelve days, the world’s political leaders are shocked by the same news——

messages.zh: ——“乌萨斯的重要城市切尔诺伯格，遭到激进感染者的占据，并且毁于天灾”——
messages.en: The major city of Ursus, Chernobog, was captured by Infected extremists, and destroyed in a Calamity——

messages.zh: 在其他城市中，这些感染者所属的组织也带领着感染者暴徒犯下了各种暴行。
messages.en: In other cities, the organization these Infected belong to also committed all kinds of atrocities.

messages.zh: 而这个感染者组织，叫做——
messages.en: And this organization of the Infected, is called——

messages.zh: ——整合运动。
messages.en: ——Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 没错。
messages.en: That's right.

messages.zh: 龙门的情报网每天都在为龙门搜刮大量的信息。我所说的，魏先生都已经知道了。
messages.en: Lungmen’s intelligence network gathers vast information for Lungmen every day. What I’ve just said, Mr.Wei already knows.

messages.zh: 目前我并不觉得，罗德岛的情报能对魏先生有什么吸引力。
messages.en: For now, I don’t think Rhodes Island’s information is by any means appealing to Mr.Wei.

messages.zh: 但据我所知，龙门近卫局对整合运动正向龙门渗透一事并无应对措施。
messages.en: But according to my knowledge, Lungmen Guard Bureau has no countermeasures for Reunion Movement’s infiltration into Lungmen.

messages.zh: 感染者检疫是不能对抗整合运动的。
messages.en: Quarantines won’t work against Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 一，整合运动不会乖乖过检——
messages.en: First, Reunion Movement won’t take the tests obediently——

messages.zh: ——二，整合运动不会等到当局反应过来才行动。
messages.en: ——Second, they won’t wait until the government reacts to act.

messages.zh: 近卫局比罗德岛更了解龙门，也更知道它的优势与缺陷。
messages.en: The Guard Bureau knows more about Lungmen than Rhodes Island, and knows better about its strengths and weaknesses.

messages.zh: 龙门没有将机密行动的方针通知罗德岛的义务。
messages.en: Lungmen is not obligated to inform Rhodes Island about its confidential operations.

messages.zh: 凯尔希小姐，请继续说。
messages.en: Ms. Kal’tsit, please continue.

messages.zh: 龙门的确有对付手无寸铁的感染者的经验——
messages.en: Lungmen does have experiences dealing with unarmed Infected——

messages.zh: 但龙门有对付集团化感染者暴徒的经验吗？
messages.en: But does Lungmen know how to deal with banded Infected mobsters?

messages.zh: 只有感染者，才能对抗感染者。
messages.en: Only the Infected, can fight against the Infected.

messages.zh: 整合运动这样规模的感染者问题，罗德岛也曾处理过？
messages.en: So, has Rhodes Island ever dealt with Infected issues the scale of Reunion Movement?

messages.zh: 不止如此。
messages.en: More than that.
Oh——?

messages.zh: 我听说，罗德岛曾卷入过事件。
messages.en: I’ve heard, that Rhodes Island has been involved in certain incidents.

messages.zh: 无论魏先生是从哪里得到这条消息的——
messages.en: Wherever did Mr. Wei hear of this——

messages.zh: 这都不是现阶段能与龙门交换的信息。
messages.en: This is not information to exchange with Lungmen at this stage.

messages.zh: 决定是否要和你们进行利益交换的是龙门。
messages.en: It is Lungmen that decides whether to make exchanges of interest with you.

messages.zh: 如果这种程度的信息罗德岛都无法提供——
messages.en: If Rhodes Island can’t even provide information of this degree——

messages.zh: 呵。龙门将无法信任你们的真实实力。
messages.en: Huh. Lungmen won’t be able to trust in your strength.

messages.zh: 罗德岛提供的信息，本身就是用实力换来的。
messages.en: The information Rhodes Island provides, is acquired by strength itself.

messages.zh: 嗯——我认可这个说法。
messages.en: Emm——this I agree.

messages.zh: 无论怎样，龙门都无法信任一群感染者。
messages.en: No matter what, Lungmen can’t trust a group of Infected.

messages.zh: 魏先生既不强求罗德岛摆明立场，也不怀疑罗德岛对任务的忠诚。
messages.en: Mr.Wei neither demands Rhodes Island make clear its position, nor doubts Rhodes Island’s loyalty to the mission.

messages.zh: 陈小姐难道认为龙门的安危，尚不如对感染者这一身份的惩罚来的重要？
messages.en: Does Ms. Ch’en think that Lungmen’s safety is less important than punishments for being an Infected?

messages.zh: 那我会立刻服从当地法令，任由陈小姐逮捕我——
messages.en: If that’s the case, then I’ll abide by your laws and let Ms.Ch’en arrest me——

messages.zh: 在监牢里看着龙门被整合运动焚烧殆尽，默默惋惜。
messages.en: And watch Lungmen being burnt down by Reunion Movement, lamenting.

messages.zh: 这次，龙门别无选择。
messages.en: This time, Lungmen has no choice.

messages.zh: ——龙门既不是因为有人出言不逊就拒绝善意的城市——
messages.en: ——Lungmen is not a city that turns down goodwill because of disrespectful words——

messages.zh: 却也不是收留无用说客的慈善机构。
messages.en: But nor is it a charity for useless braggers.

messages.zh: 陈警官。
messages.en: Officer Ch’en.

messages.zh: 魏长官，让外来的感染者参与龙门的机密事务，我认为并不妥当。
messages.en: Executive Wei, I don't think it's appropriate to let foreign Infected take part in Lungmen’s confidential affairs.

messages.zh: 陈警官，他们是客人。
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, they are guests.

messages.zh: ——我的客人。
messages.en: ——My guests.

messages.zh: 在他们违反龙门法律之前，我会容忍，长官。
messages.en: Before they break Lungmen’s law, I’ll tolerate, Executive.

messages.zh: 请放心，罗德岛的诸位，我尊重任何潜在的合作伙伴。
messages.en: Be assured, those of you from Rhodes Island, I have respect for every potential collaborator.

messages.zh: 但凯尔希小姐，我上了年纪，容易忘记谈话中那些零碎的内容......
messages.en: But Ms. Kal’tsit, I’m an old man, and I easily forget pieces of information in a conversation……

messages.zh: ——魏先生的意思是，我所阐述的事实，都不重要？
messages.en: ——Does Mr.Wei imply that, the facts I just presented, are not important at all?

messages.zh: 啊，不好意思。我想起来了，有这么一句——
messages.en: Ah, excuse me. I remember now, There was this——
——That’s right, hmm……

messages.zh: 我所看重的就只有一点。实力。
messages.en: I only care for one thing. Strength.

messages.zh: 据我所知，罗德岛也参与镇压了方才的感染者暴动吧？
messages.en: According to my knowledge, Rhodes Island took part in suppressing the Infected riot before, right?

messages.zh: 陈警官，罗德岛军事力量的实力如何？
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, What do you think of Rhodes Island’s military power?

messages.zh: ......请容我简要描述一下我所见的罗德岛的战斗。
messages.en: ……please allow be to brief my account of Rhodes Island’s battle.

messages.zh: ——详情如下——
messages.en: ——It was like this——
